You tend to be quite reserved, and sometimes a bit timid and apprehensive.
Meeting new people can be a bit nerve-wracking for you, and can make you a bit awkward and embarrassed.
You're also not too keen on public spaces or showing your face, and can be a bit reserved as a result.
You're at your best when you're with your close friends, since they've supported you and given you proper space for so long.
It might be a bit hard for you to open up at times, even when you're in need of help.
However, those who are friends with you should know that getting to know you and becoming so close with you is a truly special thing.
A shy person like you will be...
